Description
Administrator
This class manage one of the class' 'Pearson' "son".
App
This class contains the main code of our program: all the function used in other classes are joined here and their goal is make the users see what's happening during the execution of the application.
Costumer
This class manage one of the class' 'Pearson' "son".
FileIO
This class manage all the operation of Input and Output from the databases, helping with the reading and the writing of the information.
getInputFromKeyboard
This class reads text from a character-input stream, buffering characters so as to provide for the efficient reading of characters, arrays, and lines.
IOAirports
This class manage the airport database.
IOFlights
This class manage the flights database.
IOTickets
This class manage the tickets database.
IOUsers
This class manage the users database.
mailException
This class manage the exception that could be created with the insertion of a wrong mail, that doesn't respect the rules of syntax.
passwordException
This class manage the exception that could be created with the insertion of a wrong password, that doesn't respect the rules of syntax.
Pearson
This class create the object 'Pearson', that represent a user.
